name: Ninja Trader
overview:
NinjaTrader, LLC develops trading software. The companyâ€™s NinjaTrader software provides analytics, multiple order entry options, trade management, and various brokerage options for active traders; end to end platform, development environment, TradeStation and eSignal integration, back testing, automation, various brokerage options for system development and automated trading; and market analytics, trading system development, simulator for TradeStation, market data feed choice for simulated trading. The companyâ€™s NinjaTrader software also provides trade simulator, daily product training for students, instills disciplined trading management, incorporating proprietary indicators, various data feed and brokerage options for trading educators; platform, C# based development, live presentation opportunities, and NinjaTrader Website presence for 3rd party indicator and trading system providers; and end to end trading platform, priority service for clients and their customers, joint marketing, customer acquisition, and customer lifespan and retention for brokers. Its NinjaTrader software is an end to end trading platform serving discretionary and automated traders of futures, equities, and forex markets. The companyâ€™s software also features charting with order entry, real-time market scanning, trade performance analysis, simulation and market replay, broad brokerage and data feed support, 3rd party add-ons, and additional analytics. Its NinjaTrader is available at the United States and international brokerages.

The company was founded in 2003 and is based in Denver, Colorado with locations in Grand Rapids, Michigan; Rotterdam, the Netherlands; and Bamberg, Germany.
